title: XDA forums are now open for OnePlus Nord CE 2 and Moto Edge 30 Pro
content:
XDA forums provide a centralized place for millions of smartphone owners to share tips and tricks, troubleshoot issues, engage in lively discussions, and collaborate on custom development projects. We keep adding new forums for newly launched and upcoming smartphones to help users find all relevant information specific to their devices in one place. Last month

The post XDA forums are now open for OnePlus Nord CE 2 and Moto Edge 30 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: We have opened up XDA forums for two new phones: the OnePlus Nord CE 2 and Moto Edge 30 Pro. Read on to know more.
